In the literature, the norm of ` A ` is usually written as "|| ` A ` ||", but we use function value notation to take advantage of our existing theorems about functions.   imbi12d(wceq(c1, cif(c1, c0v, wcel(c1, chba))), wceq(co(cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba)), csp, c1), nat0), wceq(co(cfv(cno, co(cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba)), cva, c1)), cexp, nat2), co(co(cfv(cno, cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, c1), cexp, nat2))), wceq(co(cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba)), csp, cif(c1, c0v, wcel(c1, chba))), nat0), wceq(co(cfv(cno, co(cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba)), cva, cif(c1, c0v, wcel(c1, chba)))), cexp, nat2), co(co(cfv(cno, cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, cif(c1, c0v, wcel(c1, chba))), cexp, nat2))))
  eqeq1d(co(cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba)), csp, c1), nat0, co(cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba)), csp, cif(c1, c0v, wcel(c1, chba))), wceq(c1, cif(c1, c0v, wcel(c1, chba))))
  oveq2(c1, cif(c1, c0v, wcel(c1, chba)), cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba)), csp)
  eqeq12d(co(cfv(cno, co(cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba)), cva, c1)), cexp, nat2), co(co(cfv(cno, cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, c1), cexp, nat2)), co(cfv(cno, co(cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba)), cva, cif(c1, c0v, wcel(c1, chba)))), cexp, nat2), co(co(cfv(cno, cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, cif(c1, c0v, wcel(c1, chba))), cexp, nat2)), wceq(c1, cif(c1, c0v, wcel(c1, chba))))

  fveq2d(cno, co(cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba)), cva, c1), co(cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba)), cva, cif(c1, c0v, wcel(c1, chba))), wceq(c1, cif(c1, c0v, wcel(c1, chba))))
  oveq2(c1, cif(c1, c0v, wcel(c1, chba)), cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba)), cva)

  fveq2(c1, cif(c1, c0v, wcel(c1, chba)), cno)

blocks.name: normpyc
blocks.content: Corollary to Pythagorean theorem for orthogonal vectors. Remark 3.4(C) of [Beran] p. 98. (Contributed by NM, 26-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm normpyc(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)), wi(wceq(co(c0, csp, c1), nat0), wbr(cfv(cno, c0), cle, cfv(cno, co(c0, cva, c1)))))
} = {
  sylibrd(wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)), wceq(co(c0, csp, c1), nat0), wbr(cfv(cno, c0), cle, cfv(cno, co(c0, cva, c1))), wbr(co(cfv(cno, c0), cexp, nat2), cle, co(cfv(cno, co(c0, cva, c1)), cexp, nat2)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)), wceq(co(c0, csp, c1), nat0), wbr(co(cfv(cno, c0), cexp, nat2), cle, co(cfv(cno, co(c0, cva, c1)), cexp, nat2)))
  breqtrrd(co(cfv(cno, c0), cexp, nat2), cle, co(cfv(cno, co(c0, cva, c1)), cexp, nat2), co(co(cfv(cno, c0), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, c1), cexp, nat2)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)), wceq(co(c0, csp, c1), nat0)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)), wceq(co(c0, csp, c1), nat0), wbr(co(cfv(cno, c0), cexp, nat2), cle, co(co(cfv(cno, c0), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, c1), cexp, nat2))))
  eqbrtrrd(co(cfv(cno, c0), cexp, nat2), cle, co(co(cfv(cno, c0), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, c1), cexp, nat2)), co(co(cfv(cno, c0), cexp, nat2), caddc, nat0), wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wceq(co(co(cfv(cno, c0), cexp, nat2), caddc, nat0), co(cfv(cno, c0), cexp, nat2)))
  addid1d(co(cfv(cno, c0), cexp, nat2), wcel(c0, chba))
  recnd(co(cfv(cno, c0), cexp, nat2), wcel(c0, chba))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)), wbr(co(co(cfv(cno, c0), cexp, nat2), caddc, nat0), cle, co(co(cfv(cno, c0), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, c1), cexp, nat2))), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(cno, c1), cexp, nat2)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(cno, c1), cexp, nat2)))
  sqge0d(cfv(cno, c1), wcel(c1, chba))
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wb(wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(cno, c1), cexp, nat2)), wbr(co(co(cfv(cno, c0), cexp, nat2), caddc, nat0), cle, co(co(cfv(cno, c0), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, c1), cexp, nat2)))), wcel(co(cfv(cno, c1), cexp, nat2), cr), wcel(co(cfv(cno, c0), cexp, nat2), cr))
  resqcld(cfv(cno, c1), wcel(c1, chba))
  normcl(c1)
  resqcld(cfv(cno, c0), wcel(c0, chba))
  mp3an1(wcel(co(cfv(cno, c1), cexp, nat2), cr), wcel(co(cfv(cno, c0), cexp, nat2), cr), wb(wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(cno, c1), cexp, nat2)), wbr(co(co(cfv(cno, c0), cexp, nat2), caddc, nat0), cle, co(co(cfv(cno, c0), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, c1), cexp, nat2)))), wcel(nat0, cr))
  0re()
  leadd2(nat0, co(cfv(cno, c1), cexp, nat2), co(cfv(cno, c0), cexp, nat2))
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)), wceq(co(c0, csp, c1), nat0), wceq(co(cfv(cno, co(c0, cva, c1)), cexp, nat2), co(co(cfv(cno, c0), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cno, c1), cexp, nat2))))
  normpyth(c0, c1)
  le2sqd(cfv(cno, c0), cfv(cno, co(c0, cva, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(cfv(cno, c0), cr))
  normcl(c0)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)), wcel(cfv(cno, co(c0, cva, c1)), cr), wcel(co(c0, cva, c1), chba))
  normcl(co(c0, cva, c1))
  adantr(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cno, c0)))
  normge0(c0)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cno, co(c0, cva, c1))), wcel(co(c0, cva, c1), chba))
  hvaddcl(c0, c1)
  normge0(co(c0, cva, c1))

blocks.name: norm3difi
blocks.content: Norm of differences around common element. Part of Lemma 3.6 of [Beran] p. 101. (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm norm3difi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wbr(cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1)), cle, co(cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c2)), caddc, cfv(cno, co(c2, cmv, c1))))
  -| wcel(c0, chba)
  -| wcel(c1, chba)
  -| wcel(c2, chba)
} = {
  eqbrtri(cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1)), cle, co(cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c2)), caddc, cfv(cno, co(c2, cmv, c1))), cfv(cno, co(co(c0, cmv, c2), cva, co(c2, cmv, c1))))
  fveq2i(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1), co(co(c0, cmv, c2), cva, co(c2, cmv, c1)))
  eqtr4i(co(c0, cmv, c1), co(co(c0, cmv, c2), cva, co(c2, cmv, c1)), co(c0, cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1)))
  hvsubvali(c0, c1)
  3eqtri(co(co(c0, cmv, c2), cva, co(c2, cmv, c1)), co(c0, cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1)), co(co(c0, cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c2)), cva, co(c2, cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1))), co(c0, cva, co(co(cneg(nat1), csm, c2), cva, co(c2, cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1)))))
  oveq12i(co(c0, cmv, c2), cva, co(c2, cmv, c1), co(c0, cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c2)), co(c2, cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1)))
  hvsubvali(c0, c2)
  hvsubvali(c2, c1)
  hvassi(c0, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c2), co(c2, cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1)))
  hvaddcli(c2, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1))
  oveq2i(c0, cva, co(co(cneg(nat1), csm, c2), cva, co(c2, cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1))), co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1))
  eqtr3i(co(co(cneg(nat1), csm, c2), cva, co(c2, cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1))), co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1), co(co(co(cneg(nat1), csm, c2), cva, c2), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1)))
  hvassi(co(cneg(nat1), csm, c2), c2, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1))
  3eqtri(co(co(co(cneg(nat1), csm, c2), cva, c2), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1)), co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1), co(c0v, cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1)), co(co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1), cva, c0v))
  oveq1i(co(co(cneg(nat1), csm, c2), cva, c2), cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1), c0v)
  3eqtr2i(co(co(cneg(nat1), csm, c2), cva, c2), c0v, co(c2, cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c2)), co(c2, cmv, c2))
  hvcomi(co(cneg(nat1), csm, c2), c2)
  hvmulcli(cneg(nat1), c2)
  hvsubvali(c2, c2)
  ax-mp(wceq(co(c2, cmv, c2), c0v), wcel(c2, chba))
  hvsubid(c2)
  hvcomi(c0v, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1))
  ax-hv0cl()
  ax-mp(wceq(co(co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1), cva, c0v), co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1)), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1), chba))
  hvmulcli(cneg(nat1), c1)
  neg1cn()
  ax-hvaddid(co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1))
  norm-ii-i(co(c0, cmv, c2), co(c2, cmv, c1))
  hvsubcli(c0, c2)
  hvsubcli(c2, c1)
}

blocks.name: norm3adifii
blocks.content: Norm of differences around common element. Part of Lemma 3.6 of [Beran] p. 101. (Contributed by NM, 30-Sep-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm norm3adifii(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1)), cmin, cfv(cno, co(c2, cmv, c1)))), cle, cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c2)))
  -| wcel(c0, chba)
  -| wcel(c2, chba)
  -| wcel(c1, chba)
} = {
  mpbir2an(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1)), cmin, cfv(cno, co(c2, cmv, c1)))), cle, cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c2))), wbr(cneg(cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c2))), cle, co(cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1)), cmin, cfv(cno, co(c2, cmv, c1)))), wbr(co(cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1)), cmin, cfv(cno, co(c2, cmv, c1))), cle, cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c2))))
  mpbi(wbr(cneg(cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c2))), cle, co(cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1)), cmin, cfv(cno, co(c2, cmv, c1)))), wbr(cneg(co(cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1)), cmin, cfv(cno, co(c2, cmv, c1)))), cle, cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c2))))
  eqbrtri(cneg(co(cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1)), cmin, cfv(cno, co(c2, cmv, c1)))), cle, cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c2)), co(cfv(cno, co(c2, cmv, c1)), cmin, cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1))))
  negsubdi2i(cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1)), cfv(cno, co(c2, cmv, c1)))
  recni(cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1)))
  recni(cfv(cno, co(c2, cmv, c1)))
  mpbir(wbr(co(cfv(cno, co(c2, cmv, c1)), cmin, cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1))), cle, cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c2))), wbr(cfv(cno, co(c2, cmv, c1)), cle, co(cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c2)), caddc, cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1)))))
  breqtri(cfv(cno, co(c2, cmv, c1)), cle, co(cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c2)), caddc, cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1))), co(cfv(cno, co(c2, cmv, c0)), caddc, cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1))))
  norm3difi(c2, c1, c0)
  oveq1i(cfv(cno, co(c2, cmv, c0)), caddc, cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1)), cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c2)))
  normsubi(c2, c0)
  lesubaddi(cfv(cno, co(c2, cmv, c1)), cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1)), cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c2)))
  lenegcon1i(co(cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1)), cmin, cfv(cno, co(c2, cmv, c1))), cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c2)))
  mpbir(wbr(co(cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1)), cmin, cfv(cno, co(c2, cmv, c1))), cle, cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c2))), wbr(cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1)), cle, co(cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c2)), caddc, cfv(cno, co(c2, cmv, c1)))))
  norm3difi(c0, c1, c2)
  lesubaddi(cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1)), cfv(cno, co(c2, cmv, c1)), cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c2)))
  abslei(co(cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1)), cmin, cfv(cno, co(c2, cmv, c1))), cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c2)))
  resubcli(cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1)), cfv(cno, co(c2, cmv, c1)))
  normcli(co(c0, cmv, c1))
  hvsubcli(c0, c1)
  normcli(co(c2, cmv, c1))
  hvsubcli(c2, c1)
  normcli(co(c0, cmv, c2))
  hvsubcli(c0, c2)
}

thm norm3adifii(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (abs `((normh `(c0[-h]c1))[-](normh `(c2[-h]c1))))[≤](normh `(c0[-h]c2))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ ~H
  ⊣ c2 ∈ ~H

} = {
  mpbir2an((abs `((normh `(c0[-h]c1))[-](normh `(c2[-h]c1))))[≤](normh `(c0[-h]c2)), -u((normh `(c0[-h]c2)))[≤]((normh `(c0[-h]c1))[-](normh `(c2[-h]c1))), ((normh `(c0[-h]c1))[-](normh `(c2[-h]c1)))[≤](normh `(c0[-h]c2)))
  mpbi(-u((normh `(c0[-h]c2)))[≤]((normh `(c0[-h]c1))[-](normh `(c2[-h]c1))), -u(((normh `(c0[-h]c1))[-](normh `(c2[-h]c1))))[≤](normh `(c0[-h]c2)))
  eqbrtri(-u(((normh `(c0[-h]c1))[-](normh `(c2[-h]c1)))), cle, (normh `(c0[-h]c2)), ((normh `(c2[-h]c1))[-](normh `(c0[-h]c1))))
  negsubdi2i((normh `(c0[-h]c1)), (normh `(c2[-h]c1)))
  recni((normh `(c0[-h]c1)))
  recni((normh `(c2[-h]c1)))
  mpbir(((normh `(c2[-h]c1))[-](normh `(c0[-h]c1)))[≤](normh `(c0[-h]c2)), (normh `(c2[-h]c1))[≤]((normh `(c0[-h]c2))[+](normh `(c0[-h]c1))))
  breqtri((normh `(c2[-h]c1)), cle, ((normh `(c0[-h]c2))[+](normh `(c0[-h]c1))), ((normh `(c2[-h]c0))[+](normh `(c0[-h]c1))))
  norm3difi(c2, c1, c0)
  oveq1i((normh `(c2[-h]c0)), caddc, (normh `(c0[-h]c1)), (normh `(c0[-h]c2)))
  normsubi(c2, c0)
  lesubaddi((normh `(c2[-h]c1)), (normh `(c0[-h]c1)), (normh `(c0[-h]c2)))
  lenegcon1i(((normh `(c0[-h]c1))[-](normh `(c2[-h]c1))), (normh `(c0[-h]c2)))
  mpbir(((normh `(c0[-h]c1))[-](normh `(c2[-h]c1)))[≤](normh `(c0[-h]c2)), (normh `(c0[-h]c1))[≤]((normh `(c0[-h]c2))[+](normh `(c2[-h]c1))))
  norm3difi(c0, c1, c2)
  lesubaddi((normh `(c0[-h]c1)), (normh `(c2[-h]c1)), (normh `(c0[-h]c2)))
  abslei(((normh `(c0[-h]c1))[-](normh `(c2[-h]c1))), (normh `(c0[-h]c2)))
  resubcli((normh `(c0[-h]c1)), (normh `(c2[-h]c1)))
  normcli((c0[-h]c1))
  hvsubcli(c0, c1)
  normcli((c2[-h]c1))
  hvsubcli(c2, c1)
  normcli((c0[-h]c2))
  hvsubcli(c0, c2)
}

blocks.content: Lemma involving norm of differences in Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm norm3lem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c1)), clt, co(c2, cdiv, nat2)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(c1, cmv, c3)), clt, co(c2, cdiv, nat2))), wbr(cfv(cno, co(c0, cmv, c3)), clt, c2))
  -| wcel(c0, chba)
  -| wcel(c3, chba)
  -| wcel(c1, chba)
  -| wcel(c2, cr)
